name: Gluttonous Yumkasaur Mountain King
desc:
A powerful Yumkasaur that has survived both the ravages of time and countless battles, surviving until the present day.
This "Mountain King," who once joined forces with the great heroes against the Black Tide, holds a special place in the hearts of the Scions of the Canopy. Some tribe members believe that it has its current body shape because it has a unique physique, like the Qucusaurus "Tyrant"... Though in fact, this is simply because it's lived for so long, and eaten way, WAY too much.

value.name: Gluttonous Yumkasaur Mountain King
value.desc:
Lord of the Mountain: Gluttonous Yumkasaur Mountain King

A mighty Yumkasaurus that has survived since ancient times and seen countless battles.

dropMaterial.name: Mora
dropMaterial.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

dropMaterial.name: Companionship EXP
dropMaterial.desc: Companionship EXP. Used to increase Friendship levels.

dropMaterial.name: Overripe Flamegranate
dropMaterial.desc:
A strange Flamegranate obtained after defeating the Gluttonous Yumkasaur Mountain King.
Normally, Flamegranates that keep growing once they have already ripened simply fall into the mud and rot. But Flamegranates that have fallen from the Mountain King's mane, perhaps owing to the unique internal temperature conditions, exhibit a rarely-seen "Overripe" state. Flamegranates in this state are stable, phlogiston-packed, brightly colored, and possess a rich and highly distinctive flavor.

dropMaterial.name: Nagadus Emerald Fragment
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension Material.

"I had a very, very long dream..."

dropMaterial.name: Nagadus Emerald Chunk
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension Material.

"I had a very, very long dream..."

"In it, people were holding hands, dancing in a circle, be they sages or fools, dancers or warriors, puppets or statues of gods..."

dropMaterial.name: Nagadus Emerald Gemstone
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension Material.

"I had a very, very long dream..."

"In it, people were holding hands, dancing in a circle, be they sages or fools, dancers or warriors, puppets or statues of gods..."

"That dancing circle embodied everything about the universe. Life has always been the end, while it is wisdom that shall be the means."

customize.text: A Yumkasaurus that has experienced numerous impressive battles. It is not some abnormal mutant but has grown into its current shape due to its gluttony. It will collect Flamegranates during combat and spit them out as bombs. However, if you can use <color=#ffe14b>Pyro to ignite the Flamegranates</color> before the Gluttonous Yumkasaur Mountain King can swallow them, who knows what might happen...

<color=#ffd780>Et tu, Dinobrute?</color>
Ignite the Flamegranate before the Gluttonous Yumkasaur Mountain King swallows it, causing the fruit to explode after being swallowed.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Deep-Fried... Ice Cream?</color>
Use an exploding Flamegranate to trigger the Melt reaction on the Gluttonous Yumkasaur Mountain King.
